text:
こういうことだそうだ

> The user https://t.co/ctKYEcY6pk has somehow managed to register the noreply@anthropic.com address such that all co-authored commits relate to them, which is making our private git repos look a little worrying.

https://t.co/FW9HuaMVBA https://t.co/AfOedyMMiU
